title: Sensex slips 537pts on weak global cues, Nifty holds 17K; Bajaj Fin dips 7% - Business Standard
content: Sensex slips 537pts on weak global cues, Nifty holds 17K; Bajaj Fin dips 7%  Business Standard
description: CLOSING BELL: Life Insurance Corporation of India (LIC) will come out with its IPO on May 4
